item.title: My First Post
item.description: In these series, I will show lessons that I noticed during my learning journey of the javaascript language. I’m trying here to highlight on each tip on a practical way rather than devling into the details. Just keep in mind that Mozilla documentation should be your friend and you should be familiar with it. Well, I’d couldn’t help it either. So, you can skip to your tip. defineProperty ~indexOf [proto and prototype](#proto and prototype) call vs.
